Package pulse.input

Class InterpolationDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • pulse.input.InterpolationDataset
  • public class InterpolationDataset
extends java.lang.Object
    An InterpolationDataset stores data in a List of DataEntry<Double,Double> objects (each containing a 'key' and a 'value') and provides means to interpolate between the 'values' using the 'keys'. This is used mainly to interpolate between available data for thermal properties loaded in tabular representation, e.g. the density and specific heat tables. Features a static list of ExternalDatasetListeners.
    See Also:
    ExternalDatasetListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • InterpolationDataset

    • Method Detail

      • interpolateAt

        public double interpolateAt​(double key)
        Provides an interpolated value at key based on the available data in the DataEntry List. The interpolation is done using natural cubic splines, hence it is important that the input noise is minimal.
        Parameters:
        key - the argument, at which interpolation needs to be done (e.g. temperature)
        Returns:
        a double, representing the interpolated value

      • add

        public void add​(ImmutableDataEntry<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Double> entry)
        Adds entry to this InterpolationDataset.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to be added

      • doInterpolation

        public void doInterpolation()
        Constructs a new spline interpolator and uses the available dataset to produce a SplineInterpolation.

      • getData

        public java.util.List<ImmutableDataEntry<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Double>> getData()
        Extracts all data available in this InterpolationDataset.
        Returns:
        the List of data.

      • getDataset

        public static InterpolationDataset getDataset​(InterpolationDataset.StandartType type)
        Retrieves a standard dataset previously loaded by the respective reader.
        Parameters:
        type - the standard dataset type
        Returns:
        an InterpolationDataset corresponding to type

      • setDataset

        public static void setDataset​(InterpolationDataset dataset,
                              InterpolationDataset.StandartType type)
        Puts a datset specified by type into the static hash map of this class, using type as key. Triggers onDensityDataLoaded
        Parameters:
        dataset - a dataset to be appended to the static hash map
        type - the dataset type

      • derivableProperties

        public static java.util.List<NumericPropertyKeyword> derivableProperties()
        Creates a list of property keywords that can be derived with help of the loaded data. For example, if heat capacity and density data is available, the returned list will contain CONDUCTIVITY.
        Returns:

      • addListener

        public static void addListener​(ExternalDatasetListener l)
